column6: DEAD MEANS DEAD CHAPTER 2 As the Runaways struggle with the loss of one of their members, the young heroes must also contend with the growing pains of an all-new lineup, and an all-new threat to the Marvel Universe.
column8: | penciller (cover):Jo Chen | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Mike Norton | colorist:Christina Strain | writer:Brian K. Vaughan | inker:Craig Yeung
